npcs.name: Alfred (Guard)
npcs.text: Always watch out - a robot might be just around the corner.

npcs.name: Hanna (Guard)
npcs.text: I don't understand why the AI Core is raging like this.

npcs.name: Johannes (Guard)
npcs.text: First Rule: Keep calm and think!

npcs.name: Vitali (Guard)
npcs.text: Sometimes muscles is what you need to crush a robot.

npcs.name: Sophie (Guard)
npcs.text: Before all this I just follow my studies in medicine.

npcs.name: Memet (Guard)
npcs.text: Outside we could easily outrun them but here...

npcs.name: Martin (Guard)
npcs.text: If you find the weak spot - they just fall apart.

npcs.name: Gustav (Guard)
npcs.text: Robots are only machines. Sadly we designed them so perfectly.

npcs.name: Melanie (Guard)
npcs.text: This shock rod is just so unhandy.

npcs.name: Alex (Guard)
npcs.text: If we could just reprogram the core...
